name: Unstoppable Potato
description:
This 2 player local game puts you in the place of two brave potatoes in their way to reach the top of Mountain Evertata.

Controls:

Player 1:

--[A & D] - Move

--[W] - Jump

--[S] - Interact

Player 2:

--[Left Arrow & Right Arrow] - Move

--[Up Arrow] - Jump

--[Down Arrow] - Interact
